meanings.definition: The act of attending a movie theater to watch a film.
meanings.sent1: Filmgoing is a fun way to spend time with friends.
meanings.sent2: My family enjoys filmgoing on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I fell asleep during filmgoing once, and my friends had to wake me up!
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a constant filmgoing experience, full of drama and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The magic of filmgoing transports you to different worlds and emotions.

meanings.definition: The practice or activity of going to see movies regularly.
meanings.sent1: Filmgoing can become a favorite hobby for many people.
meanings.sent2: His filmgoing habit led him to discover many hidden gems.
meanings.sent3: I always bring extra snacks for filmgoing, just in case I get hungry!
meanings.sent4: In her mind, filmgoing was like a ritual that brought joy and relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The joy of filmgoing is unmatched, as each movie brings new experiences and emotions.
